original_text: And Lot went up out of Zoar, and dwelt in the mountain, and his two daughters with him; for he feared to dwell in Zoar: and he dwelt in a cave, he and his two daughters.
korean_text: 롯이 소알에 거주하기를 두려워하여 두 딸과 함께 소알에서 나와 산에 올라가 거주하되 그 두 딸과 함께 굴에 거주하였더니

sentences.original_text: And Lot went up out of Zoar
and his two daughters with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 두 딸도 그와 함께 있었고

sentences.original_text: for he feared to dwell in Zoar
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 소알에 거주하는 것을 두려워했기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: and he dwelt in a cave

sentences.korean_translation: 그와 그의 두 딸이 함께 있었습니다
